About.introduction: Self-taught software developer working in the field since 2023. Although my experience is mostly focused on front-end development, I also enjoy developing at the back-end. What I like most about my job is providing solutions, solving problems, and making improvements. I also enjoy being in a constant learning process.
About.linux: I have been using GNU/Linux as my only operating system since 2015, which led me to pursue a career in Software Development. Currently, I use the Fedora distribution.
About.about-website-technologies: The technologies used are Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and next-intl.
About.about-likes-1: Working with my two cats (one of the biggest advantages that working remotely gives me).
About.about-likes-2: The feeling of satisfaction after solving a problem or making an improvement in the code.
About.about-likes-3: The book The Pragmatic Programmer, by Andy Hunt and Dave Thomas. It taught me a lot of things that I apply every day.
About.about-likes-4: Keeping my code well structured and organized. These are two fundamental aspects for me when developing.
About.goal-paragraph-1: When I have the appropiate seniority and experience, I would like to become a technical lead or software architect. I know I still have a lot to learn, but I like to direct my career towards that goal.
About.goal-paragraph-2: Meanwhile, I develop CarreraIT, a web platform to help other people in the field through free resources, orientation guides and articles that I write, and surveys with feedback.

Resume.about-1: Self-taught software developer with more than a year and a half of experience, specializing in front-end development. What I like most about my job is being able to provide solutions, solve problems, and make improvements. I also enjoy being in a constant learning process.
Resume.about-2: I have been using GNU/Linux as my only operating system since 2015. Currently, I use the Fedora distribution.
Resume.about-3: I'm currently studying AWS Cloud and Software Architecture.
Resume.job3-responsibility-1: Full-stack development with Meteor, TypeScript, React.js, Node, MongoDB, and GraphQL.
Resume.job2-responsibility-1: Development of an AI platform using WordPress, JavaScript, PHP, HTML and CSS.
Resume.job2-responsibility-2: Creation and tracking of tickets in Jira, Agile, and Scrum methodologies.
Resume.job1-responsibility-1: Front-end development of a platform for students using Next.js, React, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS.
Resume.job1-responsibility-2: Front-end development of landing pages with Vite, React, Tailwind CSS and TypeScript.
Resume.job1-responsibility-3: Back-end development for web scraping using Express.js, JavaScript, SQLite and Puppeteer.
Resume.job1-responsibility-4: Back-end development with Nest.js, Docker, TypeORM and MySQL in training projects.
Resume.job1-responsibility-6: Create and manage tickets in ClickUp, following Agile and Scrum methodologies.
Resume.education2-description: I've decided to follow a self-taught approach again since I wanted more flexibility to keep working full-time as a software developer, reason why I've chosen to follow this study path.
Resume.education1-description: I studied Programming and Operating Systems subjects, which provided me with foundational knowledge in programming, GNU/Linux, and C++.

Projects.project1-description: Web platform for people interested or working in IT.
Projects.project1-technologies: Next.js, TypeScript, React.js, Tailwind CSS, Vercel
Projects.project2-description: Task management app with CRUD functions and input validation.
Projects.project2-technologies: Python, Flask, SQLite, HTML, Tailwind CSS
Projects.project3-description: Web platform for creating and viewing shipping labels.
Projects.project3-technologies: Express.js, MongoDB, TypeScript, React.js, Tailwind CSS, Vite, Vitest
Projects.project4-technologies: React.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Nest.js, MySQL, Docker, TypeORM, Faker.js, Vite
Projects.project5-description: Simple drag & drop, with a modern iOS appearance.
Projects.project6-description: Landing page where users can explore a selection of movies.

Now.now-description: What I've been doing regarding my career.
Now.book1-title: Programming TypeScript: Making Your JavaScript Applications Scale
Now.working-on-project1-description: It's my favorite personal project: when I have free time, I usually work on it.
